## Diapositiva con tabla

```{r}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

tmp <- penguins %>%
  select(species, bill_length_mm, bill_depth_mm, sex) %>%
  head()

knitr::kable(tmp)
```
